sentences.english: My father was the presiding judge in a case involving a man charged with tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 我父親是一宗一男子逃稅案的主法官。

sentences.english: Final award has already been made on the first newsprint paper antidumping case.
sentences.chinese: 首例新聞紙反傾銷案已經終裁。

sentences.english: I heard that the appeal was heard in private.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說這件上訴案沒有公開審理。

sentences.english: The police do not know who committed the crime , but they suspected Jones.
sentences.chinese: 警察不知道誰做的案，但他們懷疑瓊斯。

sentences.english: PR8 Total number of substantiated complaints regarding breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer data.
sentences.chinese: PR8違反客戶隱私及遺失客戶資料的申訴案總數。

sentences.english: In 2004, Henan's High Court reheard the seed case.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，河南省高院重審了這個種子案。

sentences.english: This is in the bright history famous "the red pill document".
sentences.chinese: 這就是明歷史上有名的“紅丸案”。

sentences.english: Armed robbery and abduction have been on the increase countrywide.
sentences.chinese: 持械搶劫和誘拐案的案發率在全國範圍內都有所上升。

sentences.english: Now her case is hurtling toward the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 目前，費舍女士案已經告到聯邦最高法院。

sentences.english: The most famous of the Catholic compiracies was the Gunpowder plot of 1605.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的天主教陰謀是1605年的火藥陰謀案。

sentences.english: Could you consider accepting our counterproposal？
sentences.chinese: 你能考慮接受我們的反對案嗎？

sentences.english: C. Discussion on Freshman English course for DFLL majors.
sentences.chinese: 有關檢討外文系大一英文課程案，提請討論。

sentences.english: The case against the policemen hinged on his evidence.
sentences.chinese: 對警察的指控案取決於他的證據。

sentences.english: Well, really, this is a very pretty little mystery.
sentences.chinese: 這真是一件非常有趣的小祕案。
